page.title: 13HOUSING IN BEADNELL.
page.content: In Beadnell houses are mainly brick,older houses stone,73% second homes,some are holiday lets.Almost all houses are owner occupied. 546 houses in Beadnell village. House prices Â£25-38,000. Houses range in age from the late 1800's - the cottages at Benthall and behind Church.Before 1920 there were 49 houses in the village 1920-1930- Harbour Rd & Swinhoe Rd & kipper sheds converted to houses. 1950's Wamses,1960's Longstone Park, 1970's Longstone Close. There were 38 council houses,19 sold to occupiers. Beadnell House-former Hotel,now empty. Beadnell Hall-17th century,now flats. 2 stone lodges built 1985. Other prominent buildings,St Ebbas Towers Hotel,Craster Arms,Old School 1906,W.I. Hall,Alexandra House.
